contentrichtext.text: {|{{Infobox Ship Begin}} {{Infobox Ship Image |Ship image=[[File:HMS Arab (1901).jpg|300px|HMS Arab]] |Ship caption=HMS ''Arab'' }} {{Infobox Ship Career |Hide header= |Ship country=UK |Ship flag=[[Image:Naval Ensign of the United Kingdom.svg|60px|RN Ensign]] |Ship name=HMS ''Arab'' |Ship namesake= |Ship ordered=1896/1897 Programme |Ship builder=[[John Brown & Company]] |Ship laid down= |Ship launched=9 Feb 1901<ref name=BC>{{cite web|url=http://www.battleships-cruisers.co.uk/hms_arab.htm|title=HMS ''Arab'' at BattleshipsCruisers.co.uk|accessdate=2009-04-02}}</ref> |Ship acquired= |Ship commissioned= |Ship decommissioned= |Ship in service= |Ship out of service= |Ship struck= |Ship reinstated= |Ship honours= |Ship fate=Disposed of in 1919 |Ship motto= |Ship nickname= |Ship captured= |Ship status= |Ship notes= |Ship badge= }} {{Infobox Ship Characteristics |Hide header= |Header caption= |Ship class=[[B class destroyer (1913)|B-class destroyer]] |Ship type= |Ship displacement=(470 Tons ) |Ship length= |Ship beam= |Ship draught= |Ship propulsion= (IHP 8,600FD) |Ship speed= {{convert|30.5|kn|km/h}} |Ship range= |Ship complement=69 |Ship crew= |Ship armament=1 × 12-pounder gun<br />2 × torpedo tubes<br />5 x 6-pounder |Ship armour= |Ship notes= }} |} {{otherships|HMS Arab}} '''HMS ''Arab''''' (1896 to 1897 Programme) was a [[B class destroyer (1913)|B-class]] [[torpedo boat destroyer]] of the [[United Kingdom|British]] [[Royal Navy]]. She was laid down by [[J & G Thomson]] at [[Clydebank]] and completed by [[John Brown & Company]] who took over the yard. She ran 9 trials between 11 March and 27 May 1901, but only succeeded in reaching 30.5 knots (56 km/h). Three thousand pounds were abated for failure to reach contract speed, the actual price paid being £63,642. After serving in home waters, was disposed of in 1919. ==References== {{reflist}} <!-- non-breaking space to keep AWB drones from altering the space before the navbox--> {{B class destroyer (1913)}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Arab (1901)}} [[Category:B-class destroyers (1913)]] [[Category:Clyde-built ships]] [[Category:1901 ships]] [[Category:World War I destroyers of the United Kingdom]] {{UK-destroyer-stub}} [[sl:HMS Ardent (H41)]]
